data.name: jquery_calendar_asamodule
data.marketing: Allows you to create a module to display a date picker in a module position.
data.description: Allows you to create a module to display a date picker in a module position. Set the asamodule task to 'jquery_calendar_asamodule' and the arguments to '&property_uid=N' where N is the property uid of the property who's booking form you want to direct the user to.
data.change_log: v1.1 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.2 Modified functionality to use new get_booking_url function.
data.author: Vince Wooll
